title: Hot and Cold Cafe
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Indian, Organic, Buffet, Mediterranean, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Offers a wide variety of indicated vegetarian items in both the Mediterranean and Indian sections with vegan items. Cozy locally owned restaurant which the owner personally runs with his wife and a few other staff. Welcoming atmosphere with the inviting aromas of Indian spices.
